author: Roborider_in_the_sky
title: Sweet
review:
This is one of 2 Robo Riders that has a mask. I wish the lego group kept this seris and had more story line.
Pros
Wheels glow in the dark
Shoots wheels
Can change height
Red light sabers
Kick stand
Cool combiner set
Cons
cannot stand up without kick stand
Rubber band will break after awhile
If you see this Any where get it!

author: Gus_263
title: Glow in the dark wheels
review: Like all roboriders, this set contains wheels that can be launched. But, of this, glows in the dark. It is very usable to creations, the wheels, for all themes that contain wheels, the red pieces as lightsabers, and some pieces to bionicle. The line roboriders overs, but they can be used in all sets, to make it, use the imagination!

author: KLOKRIECHER
title: LEGO Technic (Robo Riders) - Onyx Review
review:
This set is a nice set to have and very fun to play with. This model is an easy build and we also don't get any stickers to worry about. It's also very easy to maneuver this vehicle. This set also has wheels which glow in the dark. If you want to shoot the wheels you have to slide the piece where you can see the wheel on the front out and move it up. There's also a gear which can move the wheel on the back up and down and it also has a laser on each side. As I told you in the beginning: It's a great set to have - also for pieces which you can use for MOC's (My own creations) and/or brickfilms for sure.

All in all this set is an good set and I would recommend you to get this. You can find this set on eBay, BrickLink and Amazon for sure. Here is the link where you can check out the full gallery I made for this set on my website: http://www.klokriecher.de

author: J__B_
title: Awesome
review:
This was one of my later "RoboRiders" purchases. It complimented the others nicely, while still having many features that the others didn't have.

I was REALLY excited to have TWO red lightsaber blades in ONE set.
